SamPy.bolshoi.testLightcone.scatterHistograms¶

SamPy.bolshoi.testLightcone.scatterHistograms(xdata, ydata, xlabel, ylabel, output, solid_angle=1638.0)¶

This functions generates a scatter plot and projected histograms to both axes.
